famousQuotesContents.Quote: Memories are timeless treasures of the heart.
famousQuotesContents.Author: Eudora Welty

famousQuotesContents.Quote: We do not remember days; we remember moments.
famousQuotesContents.Author: Dr. Seuss

famousQuotesContents.Quote: A memory is a photograph taken by the heart to make a moment last forever.
famousQuotesContents.Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
